Homesite4 5 Beta Available

14 Oct 1999

Allaire are now at public beta stage of HomeSite4.5, and have a version available for registered HS4 users to download.

\n If that's you, then you can grab it from the Beta site, or email beta@allaire.com to request the download, but make sure you read the NDA first.
